# ContextValues.Rank method

Uses the context value associated with the specified AbilityRankType.

```csharp
public static ContextValue Rank(AbilityRankType type = AbilityRankType.Default)
```

## Remarks

The value associated with an AbilityRankType is determined using ContextRankConfig. See [the wiki page](https://github.com/TylerGoeringer/OwlcatModdingWiki/wiki/ContextRankConfig) for more details.
